channel.title: Free console or game, 100% legit
channel.description:
Hey - I know these sites have had a bad rap in the past here, but bear with me.
This is a paid-to-complete site offering ps3s, xboxs, ds's etc for 8-12 referrals, as well as games for 4. In order to qualify, you have to complete one offer, as well as referring the # of people required for your gift. There is ONE free offer, the Lovefilm 2 week free trial. In order to complete this offer, you must
a) not have signed up for Lovefilm before b) receive at least one dvd rental (free) you can cancel the trial after receiving the dvd and then send it back (watch it first, woo free movie)
If you're not eligible for lovefilm, there are paid offers, very cheap. The bingo one is £5, you must deposit £5 and then play with it. That's it.
The best thing about this site? [b]He sends the gifts 5 days after you quality[/b]. That is AMAZING for a free gift side, most of them you don't get your gift for weeks, if its something this expensive.
Anyways, since I can 100% guarantee this site is legit (I have spoken to the owner, he's a very chill guy, and I know 2 people who have received gifts, one of which was a PS3 so not a cheapie) I've decided to set up an official Moparisthebest conga line.
[i]This will be a 4 referral line[/i]. Why 4? Because full congas are dumb, and 4 is enough to get a free game, for the people who aren't interested in going after the consoles.
How does it work?
1. You sign up for the conga line under the current top members link (next thread down). 2. Reply to this thread, stating the first part of your email address and which offer you used. 3. Wait for the person at the top of the conga to verify that you have completed your offer, through the site control panel. 4. You will be at the top of the conga for 4 referrals, then you move into completed.
DO NOT POST YOUR LINK ANYWHERE IN THE THREAD UNTIL YOU ARE AT THE TOP OF THE CONGA. VIOLATING THIS RULE = DISQUALIFICATION.
Next thread = status shits.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2008, 01:33:09 am[/size][hr]Current conga status: 1. HcoJustin - http://consoles.real-incentives.com/49343 2. Moparisthebest 3. MissSilabSoft 4. Sup000
Pending/Completed: 1. Mopman -- <Pending>
Let's go chaps ;)

Oh more more thing to add that eXeem has told me, for those using LoveFilm, be it the movie or game one: although you can cancel at any time before your trial ends and not be charged anything, you don’t want to do that until your offer is marked as completed in the control panel, or it will never happen.

Bit sneaky that.

item.title: Free console or game, 100% legit
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yep, all 4 of you are on my list, nobody is showing as completed yet, but I am informed that this is normal and they have to check nobody is using false info and suchlike. Put myself off the line anyway for now, so new signups don’t accidentally give me more than 4. Justin, what was your link again?

I just noticed two things: the 4-referral games offer is actually for TWO games, of your choice as long as they arent over £40, thats a pretty damn good deal that you can get just by joining this conga

Also, there are seperate offers for the US folks to the UK folks, and the US ones look considerably better than ours, for some reason.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2008, 03:14:54 am[/size][hr]EDIT: Another fun fact, all you 4 guys ids are consecutive - MITB IS IN YOUR WEBSITE, BOOSTING YOUR MEMBERZ!
